meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or knowledgeable in a particular field.
meanings.sent1: The boffins in the lab were working on a new invention.
meanings.sent2: The boffins at the conference shared their research findings.
meanings.sent3: The boffins decided to have a friendly competition to test their skills.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, boffins are the wizards of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The boffins' expertise shone brightly during the experiment.

meanings.definition: A group of experts or intellectuals.
meanings.sent1: At the university, the boffins gathered to discuss the latest theories.
meanings.sent2: The boffins collaborated on a project to solve a complex problem.
meanings.sent3: During the debate, the boffins presented their arguments with passion.
meanings.sent4: In the literary world, the boffins are the guardians of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The boffins' wisdom guided the team to success.
